content: description this textured pullover is slightly oversized and made with easy drop sleeve construction using an easy row repeat to create a beautiful fabric this flattering and cozy pullover will be your new favorite sweater written in american standard terms materials 5 50 mm crochet hook 6 8 10 11 skeins in color theory #619 - 149x - satellite #4 worsted weight yarn 1677 1895 2337 2535 yards skill level intermediate sizing xs/s m/l xl/2x 3x/4x chart included for sizing
